basic.description: This course covers a range of modern statistical topics in high dimensional modeling and analysis. The course teaches methods, theory and computation with rich high-dimensional data applications from signal processing, machine learning, bioinformatics and econometrics.
basic.subject: STA
basic.title: High-Dimensional Statistics

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: STA 5167 and STA 5326. Recommended prerequisite: STA 5168.
